value:
I bet you know all the hiding spots.
For candy, I mean! Your outfit...looks
useful for that.$k$pDressed like this, I don't have
anywhere I can stash my sweets.

We got the army together at an
Outrealms resort for some fun...$k$pWe collected shells and got attacked
by bugs, and somebody tried to feed
me a very disturbing cake.

Those Order of Heroes uniforms look
really toasty. Take a page from my
book and shed a few layers!

Can I ask you a favor? Would you go
and get some honey for me?$k$pI'd do it myself, but...would you be
brave enough to fight off bees while
dressed like this? Me neither.

I guess that's just about enough
training for today! If I hear another
crack about baby fat...

What are you looking at me like that
for? I know I look a little shifty...but I'm
just delivering greetings! Honest.

After working so hard in the
summer heat...I deserve this.

I get the job done...no matter how
I'm dressed.

Well, what did you expect? I'm
wearing a swimsuit, here.

Thanks... Now let's sneak off and
eat ice pops together.

I'm Gaius. I don't turn down jobs,
even when I'm on vacation. You got
one for me?

Man, is it hot... Wait. What do you
want? I don't have any sweets to
share...$k$pYou saw the tattoo on my arm when
I was swimming?!$k$pKeep it down! I'm trying to keep a lid
on that...$k$pIt's a mark they put on convicts
where I come from. I did a favor for a
buddy, and that's what it got me...$k$pTalk is cheap, and I don't need your
pity. But...it's nice to know you're not
judging me for my past.$k$pAnd you know what? It's summer. I
should let loose and try to have fun.
Be a good guy for once.$k$pAfter all, I've got you on my side, don't
I? Things could be worse!
はっ！
Take this!
Choco!
You've done it now!
So hot!
It's too damn hot!
Serving it hot!
Tropical attack!
Bittersweet...
Heh
When it's hot like this, you gotta choose sweets that won't melt.
Ugh—I hate that ocean air. Too salty.
The bandana? It's...well...it just looks cool, all right?
I fight better when I'm not so exposed.
Even I wouldn't try to hide sweets in a swimsuit.
One good thing about the tropics: sweet, sweet fruit all over the place.
When it's hot like this, you can pay me in frozen-juice bars.
Hey.
Ugh.
Sweet.
You expect me to steal stuff dressed like this?
